message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more as I started, but we both get a good deal.
I think we should divide it more equally, but I get a bit more since I'm making the offer this round.
Bob, let's be real.  I'll take a bit less than my first offer, but this split makes more sense given the time pressure.
Time pressure is on both of us, I'll take a bit more but still giving you a good deal.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Meet me in the middle or we both lose out!
Fine, let's meet in the middle. We're both losing out due to inflation, this is the fairest deal.
